Web Scripts Installation
1. In Alfreso Explorer (Web Client) use the Import action and import integratedsemantics.zip into /Company Home/Data Dictionary/Web Scripts Extensions/
folder inside it will be unzipped automatically
2. restart Alfresco server or use the "Refresh Web Scripts" button on http://localhost:8080/alfresco/service/ on the web script home page
3. verify install of webscripts on the web script home page by "Browse by Web Script Package" and you should see bunch of /integratedsemantics packages

FlexibleShare "In Browser" Installation
1. web script installation required first
2. copy "flexible-share" folder to <alfresco install dir>/tomcat/webapps
3. configure domain (hostname or ip address) and port in FlexSpacesConfig.xml
4. run  http://localhost:8080/flexible-share/FlexibleShare.html

FlexibleShare AIR Installation
1. web script installation required first
2. Run FlexibleShareAir.air to install but don't launch right after install
3. configure domain (hostname or ip address) and port in FlexSpacesConfig.xml
on 32 bit Windows FlexSpacesConfig.xml is in c:\Program Files\FlexibleShareAIR\FlexSpacesConfig.xml
on 64 bit Windows FlexSpacesConfig.xml is in C:\Program Files (x86)\FlexibleShareAir 
on Mac: In finder choose "Show Package Contents" on installed FlexibleShareAir.app, FlexSpacesConfig.xml is in contents/resources/
